home.welcome: Welcome to the Cookiebot Settings Panel!
home.slogan: Your buddy for all your conversations!
home.groupBotCount: I am currently in {count} active groups!
home.inviteMeText:
If you wish to add it to a group, select “+ Add Me!”
Or ir you wish to configure any settings, go ahead and select the setting to be configured!
Any doubts or feedback, contact @MekhyW
general.welcomeLabel: Enter the message that will appear when someone joins the group.
general.chatrulesLabel: Enter the chat rules that appear when typing the /rules command
general.checkOptions1: Avoid Commands Conflicting with other Bots
mod.title: Moderation
mod.captchaSubtitle: Set the time in seconds for the Captcha to Join Group
mod.stickerSubtitle: Set the amount of stickers sent to trigger warning for spam
mod.timeoutSubtitle: Set the time in minutes without sending any images when someone joins group
posts.title: Posts and Publications
posts.content: Allow to send posts from this group to others
posts.receive: Allow to receive posts from other groups
posts.sliderSubtitle: Set the maximum amount of posts sent by Cookiebot daily to your group
